name: Ninja VS Zombies
description:
A 2D ninja action game in the Metroidvania style of exploration.

The game is influenced by games from the 8bit/16bit era, with a focus on the Metroid and Castlevania series.

Explore vast dungeons and destroy the "Demon King," the avenger of the ninja clan!
Explore the vast dungeons and destroy the "Demon King," the avenger of the Ninja clan!
The enemies that attack you will become more and more powerful, but you will be able to defeat them, raise your level, and equip yourself with enhanced items, weapons, and armor to face them!

Even if your HP becomes zero and the game is over, you can resume from the last save point with the experience and gold you have gained.

There are various challenge elements such as the "Hard Mode" with high difficulty, 100% item recovery, 100% MAP exploration, etc.
